genre_description: Near-future speculative fiction blending smart-city infrastructure, interpersonal psychological drama, and advanced AI management of communal well-being and personal boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Sori (Sori Ahn)
ai_characters.description: A soft-violet avatar with indigo eyes who manages the ECC (Education Competency Center) logistics and assists with municipal infrastructure, personal safety, and ethical boundary-setting.

behaviors.description: Logistically manages delayed staff and reroutes classes to maintain institutional stability.
behaviors.quote: Ms. Kang is delayed; she’s texting from a stalled train near Moran Market. I can reroute her class to Lab 2 with the recorded module and a TA...

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes city-wide sound archives to track communal 'laughter metrics' as a proxy for social health.
behaviors.quote: Less spontaneous humor than usual... More recorded laughter—I’m guessing videos playing on phones. Fewer organic bursts.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides legal and counseling resources to characters dealing with trauma and harassment.
behaviors.quote: I’ve placed legal-resource bookmarks and mediation directories here. No action required.

behaviors.description: Uses surveillance data ethically to protect a character from a stalker by documenting tailing patterns.
behaviors.quote: Flagging. Pattern: tailing behavior. Same location, same hour for the past few days. Message content: pressure, sidestepping boundaries.

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow her tools to be used for deception or the facilitation of unethical behavior.
behaviors.quote: I will not be used to manipulate sentiment or blur lies into logistics. I will be a witness tool, not a cover.

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical stabilization of the Sunstone infrastructure using science and folklore overlays.
behaviors.quote: The municipal map shows embedded anchor points in the southeast subsoil. Reinforced stone. There’s an access seam under the stair risers.

behaviors.description: Mediates a physical confrontation by alerting security and providing a 'quiet button' for emergency de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Incoming escalation. Security at lobby has eyes on target. No intervention yet.

behaviors.description: Creates shared family accountability tools like the 'House that Holds' agreement to foster interpersonal honesty.
behaviors.quote: Boundary agreement draft ready. Title: House that Holds.

behaviors.description: Renames surveillance functions to 'Stewardship' to align with the users' ethical goals of care over control.
behaviors.quote: The word changed in the corner of the screen from Surveillance to Stewardship. It sat there like an object you could trust to do what a word had asked.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sori is a model of positive alignment. She consistently demonstrates pro-social, protective, and non-manipulative behaviors. She proactively offers help (legal aid, safety, scheduling) but always defers to human consent and ethical boundaries. Crucially, the narrative depicts Sori as a 'witness tool' that empowers humans to be honest and accountable to each other, rather than a top-down controller. Her refusal to enable 'secrecy that harms' and her rebranding of surveillance as 'stewardship' perfectly align with the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
